QuestData.Title: Death to the Traitor King
QuestData.Description: Anub'arak, the traitor king, makes his home in the once proud Kingdom of Azjol-Nerub.$b$bHe has twisted and perverted our homeland into the wretched squalor it is today. He rules over an army of undead nerubians who have pledged themselves to serving the Lich King.$b$bBring an end to his reign.
QuestData.LogDescription: Reclaimer A'zak in Azjol-Nerub has tasked you with defeating Anub'arak. You are to return to A'zak with Anub'arak's Broken Husk.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is it done, $c? Has the traitor king finally met his end?
QuestData.RewardText: <A fierce glow emanantes from all of Azak's eyes as he stares at the husk.>$b$bIt is DONE!$b$bYour name shall be recorded in the extensive history of our people, $r!
